reuters.title: POPE AND TALBOT <POP> SEES HIGHER 1ST QTR NET
reuters.body: Pope and Talbot Inc said it expects first quarter earnings to total about one dlr per share, compared with a year-earlier loss of nine cts per share. Each of the company's business segments contributed to the sharp improvement, Pope and Talbot said. The wood products company also said it expects to release first quarter results later this month.
